title: Night Before Christmas Mice
instructions: Melt white chocolate chips in microwave, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth. Stir in sour cream and cookie crumbs. Refrigerate until firm enough to shape. Roll into oval shapes for mouse bodies. Dip tips in red candy melt to make little hats or scarves. Add sliced almonds for ears, mini chocolate chips for eyes, and licorice strings for tails.
